summary: Gives Dwemer Weapons the base damage of their Daedric counterparts *as per request - http://forums.bethsoft.com/topic/1327968-req-some-dwemer-weapons-that-have-stats-equal-to-daedric-weapons/*
descriptionHtml:
Gives Dwemer Weapons the base damage of their Daedric counterparts *as per request - http://forums.bethsoft.com/topic/1327968-req-some-dwemer-weapons-that-have-stats-equal-to-daedric-weapons/* 

Details
======
Base damage of Dwemer Weapons are as follows;

- Dwemer Dagger; 11
- Dwemer Bow; 19
- Dwemer Sword; 14
- Dwemer War Axe; 15
- Dwemer Mace; 16
- Dwemer Greatsword; 24
- Dwemer Battleaxe; 25
- Dwemer Warhammer; 27

Install
=====
Automatic:Use Nexus Mod Manager(NMM)

Manual: Extract the contents of archive to skyrim/Data folder. Open Skyrim Launcher and then Data files. Make sure the checkbox next to \"Daedric-Quality Dwemer Weapons\" is checked.

Uninstall
========
Automatic: Deactivate using NMM

Manual: Uncheck the checkbox next to \"Daedric-Quality Dwemer Weapons\" and delete the Daedric-Quality Dwemer Weapons.esp file from your skyrim/Data folder.

Incompatibilty
============
Any other mod that alters the base damage of Dwemer weapons.

Credits
======
Thanks to DaveHumphries for his wonderful tool, SkyEdit
author: Claw3000
